LanguageData.Alien_Miho.label: Miho
LanguageData.Alien_Miho.description: The common ancestor of many Miho species, including the Ordinary, is thought to be a red fox, not a human. Obviously, it was not a natural evolution but it's thought to have been caused by something transcendent. They look like humans but they're not. Miho have a Mist Flower organ in their bodies that determines the strength of their psychic powers based on the amount of sunlight they receive, which is linked to the mechanites in their bodies. Because of this organ, foxes worship the sun and it's energy.
LanguageData.Alien_Miho.tools.0.label: Left Punch
